g.text: 1.1.0 Request Participant Position and Limit Details
Fetch Participant Limits for currency and type
Fetch Participant Limit for currencyId and type(if passed)
Retrieved Participant Limits for currencyId and type
Return Participant Limits for currencyId and type
Fetch Participant Limits for all currencies and type
Fetch Participant Limit for all currencies and type(if passed)
Retrieved Participant Limits for all currencies and type
Return Participant Limits for all currencies and type
